chapter.text: 17|1|Zanmei an la, chaojue wanwu, ta zai yiye zhi jian, shi ta de puren, cong jin si xing dao yuan si, wo zai yuan si de sizhou jiang fu, yibian wo zhaoshi ta wo de yibufen jixiang, an la que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de.
17|2|Wo ba jingdian shangci mu sa, bingyong zuo yiselie de zisun de xiangdao. Wo shuo:“Nimen buyao she wo er caiqu renhe baohu zhe!”
17|3|Wo ceng shi qi yu nu ha tongzhougongji zhe de zisun a! Ta yuan shi yige gan'en de puren.
17|4|Wo ceng zai jingdian li qishi dui yiselie de houyi de panjue shuo:“Nimen biding yao zai da dishang liang ci zuoluan, nimen biding hen aoman.”
17|5|Dang di yici zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo paiqian wo de xuduo qiangda de puren qu chengzhi nimen, tamen jiu sousuole zhuzhai, na shi yao luxing de nuoyan.
17|6|Ranhou, wo wei nimen huifule dui tamen de youshi, wo yi caifu he zisun zizhu nimen, wo shi nimen gengjia fushu.

17|7|Wo shuo:“Ruguo nimen xingshan, name, nimen shi wei ziji er xingshan; ruguo nimen zuo'e, nimen shi wei ziji er zuo'e.” Dang di er ci zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou,(wo you paiqian tamen), yibian tamen shi nimen bian cheng wei choumeikulian de, yibian tamen xiang tou yi ci nayang zai ru jin si, yibian tamen ba ziji suo zhanling di difang jiayi cuihui.
17|8|(Ruguo nimen huigai), nimen de zhu huoxu hui lianmin nimen. Ruguo nimen chongxin weikang wo, wo jiang chongxin chengzhi nimen. Wo yi huo yu wei bu xindao zhe de jianyu.
17|9|Zhe bu “gulanjing” bi yindao ren yu zhi zhengzhi lu, bing yugao xingshan de xinshimen, tamen jiangyao xiangshou zuida de baochou.
17|10|(Hai yugao) bu xin houshi zhe, wo yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa.
17|11|Ren qidao huo fu, xiang qidao xingfu yiyang, ren shi jizao de.

17|12|Wo yi zhouye wei liang zhong jixiang, wo mo diao heiye de jixiang, bing yi baizhou wei mingliang de, yibian nimen xunqiu cong nimen de zhu fachu de enhui, yibian nimen zhidao lifa he suanshu. Wo mingbai di jieshi yi qie jixiang.
17|13|Wo shi mei geren de xingwei fuzhuo zai ta de bozi shang. Zai fuhuo ri, wo yao wei mei geren quchu yige zhankai de benzi,
17|14|(shuo):“Ni du ni de benzi ba! Jintian, ni yi zu wei ziji de qingsuan ren.”
17|15|Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru mitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu taren de zui. Paiqian shizhe zhiqian, wo bu chengfa (renhe ren).
17|16|Dang wo yao huimie yige shi zhen de shihou, wo mingling qizhongguo anle shenghuo zhe fucong wo, dan tamen fangdang bu jian, suoyi ying shou xingfa de panjue. Yushi wo huimie tamen.
17|17|Zai nu ha zhihou, wo hui mie liao ruogan shidai. Ni de zhu duiyu qi puren de zuixing, zu wei che zhi zhe he mingcha zhe.

17|18|Fan yu huode xianshi shenghuo zhe, wo jiang zai xianshi yi wo suo yiyu de baoda tamen zhong wo suo yiyu zhe. Ranhou, wo jiang yi huo yu chengzhi tamen, tamen jiang shou zebei, zao qi juedi jinru huo yu.
17|19|Fan yu huode houshi, bing wei ci er jin nuli de xindao zhe, zhe deng ren de nuli shi you baochou de.
17|20|Zhe deng ren he na deng ren, wo du yao yi ni de zhu de shangci zizhu tamen, ni de zhu de shangci, bushi shou zu'ai de.
17|21|Ni kan wo zenyang shi tamen zhong de yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren; houshi que shi pinji geng gao, youyue geng shen de.
17|22|Ni buyao shi renhe wu yu an la tong shou chongbai, yimian ni bian cheng shou zebei, zao yiqi de.

17|23|Ni de zhu ceng xialing shuo: Nimen yingdang zhi chongbai ta, yingdang xiaojing fumu. Ruguo ta lia zhong de yiren huozhe liang ren zai ni de tangshang dadao laomai, name, ni buyao dui ta lia shuo:“Pei!” Buyao hechi ta lia, ni yingdang dui ta lia shuo you limao dehua.
17|24|Ni yingdang bigongbijing de fushi ta lia, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni lianmin ta lia, jiu xiang wo younian shi ta lia yangyu wo nayang.”
17|25|Nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xinqing de. Ruguo nimen shi shanliang de, name, ta duiyu changchang huiguo zhe que shi zhi she de.
17|26|Ni yingdang ba qinqi, pinmin, luke suo ying de de zhouji fen gei tamen, ni buyao huihuo;
17|27|huihuo zhe que shi emo de pengyou, emo yuan shi gufu zhu en de.
17|28|Ruguo ni bixu qiu de ni suo xiwang de cong zhu jiang shi de enhui hou caineng zhouji tamen, name, ni yinggai dui tamen shuo wenhe dehua.
17|29|Ni buyao ba ziji de shou shu zai bozi shang, ye buyao bashou wanquan shen kai, yimian ni bian cheng huihen de shou zebei zhe.
17|30|Ni de zhu bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang fuyu, bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang jiongpo. Ni de zhu duiyu ta de zhong pu, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.
17|31|Nimen buyao yinwei pa pinqiong er shahai ziji de ernu, wo gongji tamen he nimen. Shahai tamen que shi dazui.
17|32|Nimen buyao jiejin si tong, yinwei si tong que shi xialiu de shi, zhe xingjing zhen elie!
17|33|Nimen buyao weibei an la de jinling er sharen, chufei yinwei zhengyi. Wugu'er bei sha zhe, wo yi ba quanbing shouyu ta de qinqi, dan tamen buke lan sha, tamen que shi shou yuanzhu de.
17|34|Nimen buyao jiejin gu er de caichan, chufei yizhao zui youliang de fangshi, zhidao ta chengnian. Nimen yingdang luxing nuoyan; nuoyan que shi yao bei shenwen de shi.
17|35|Dang nimen mai liang de shihou, yingdang liang zu fenliang, nimen yingdang shiyong gongping de cheng cheng huowu, zhe shi shanshi, shi jieju zui you de.
17|36|Ni buyao suicong ni suo bu zhidao de yanxing, ermu he xinling dou shi yao bei shenwen de.
17|37|Ni buyao jiao'ao ziman di zai dadishang xingzou, ni jue buneng ba dadi ta chuan, jue buneng yu shan bi gao.
17|38|Zhexie shi, qi elie shi ni de zhu suo yanwu de.
17|39|Zhe shi ni de zhu suo qishi ni de zhihui, ni buyao shi renhe shenming yu an la tong shou chongbai, fouze, ni jiang zai shou zebei he zao qi jue de qingkuang xia bei touru huo yu.
17|40|Nandao nimen de zhu ba nan'er shangci nimen, er yi zhong tianshi wei ziji de nu'er ma? Nimen dique shuo chu huangmiu dehua.
17|41|Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo que yi fanfu shenshu zhege zongzhi, yibian tamen mingji. Zhe zhong shenshu zhi hui shi tamen gengjia zengwu.
17|42|Ni shuo:“Jiaruo you xuduo shenming he ta zai yiqi, youru tamen suo shuo di nayang, name, naxie shenling biding xiangfa shefa yu baozuo de zhu zheng heng.”
17|43|Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu, ta jue ran chao hu tamen suo shuo de!
17|44|Qi ceng tian he da di, yiji wan you, dou zansong ta chaojue wanwu, wu yi wu bu zansong ta chaojue wanwu. Dan nimen bu liaojie tamen de zansong. Ta que shi rongren de, que shi zhi she de.
17|45|Dang ni songdu “gulanjing” de shihou, wo zai ni he buxin houshi zhe zhi jian anzhi yidao yin wei de pingzhang.

17|46|Wo zai tamen de xin shang jiale xuduo zhaozi, yimian tamen liaojie “gulanjing”; you zai tamen de er li zao zhong'er, dang ni zai “gulanjing” li zhi ti dao ni de zhu de shihou, tamen zengwu de li qu.

17|47|Wo zui zhidao tamen weihe yao qingting ni song jing, dangshi tamen lai qingting ni song jing, bingqie mimi de tanhua. Dangshi bu yi zhemen shuo:“Nimen zhishi shuncong yige zhongle moshu de ren.”
17|48|Ni kan tamen wei ni dale xuduo biyu, dan tamen dou mi wule, tamen buneng huode yitiao chulu.
17|49|Tamen shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women huan yiding bei fuhuo chengwei xinren ma?
17|50|Ni shuo:“Jinguan nimen bian cheng shitou, huo tie kuai,

17|51|huo nimen renwei geng nanyu jieshou shengming de shenme dongxi.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Shei shi women fuhuo ne?” Ni shuo:“Chuci chuangzao nimen de zhu.” Tamen jiang dui ni yaotou shuo:“Zhe jian shi jiang zai he shi fachu ne?” Ni shuo:“Zhe jian shi huoxu shi linjin de.”
17|52|Zai na ri, ta jiang zhaohuan nimen, er nimen jiang yi rongci daying ta. Nimen jiang caixiang ziji zai fenmu li zhi douliule yihui'er.
17|53|Ni gaosu wo de purenmen shuo: Jiao tamen shuo zhe ju zui youmei dehua——emo biding yao lijian tamen, emo que shi renlei de ming di——
17|54|“nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de, ta yao lianmin nimen jiu lianmin nimen; ta yao chengfa nimen jiu chengfa nimen.” Wo mei paiqian ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe.
17|55|Ni de zhu shi zui zhidao tiandi wanwu de. Wo que yi shi yibufen xianzhi chaoyue ling yibufen; wo ceng ba jingdian “zai bu'er” shangci da wu de.
17|56|Ni shuo:“Nimen she an la er cheng wei shenming zhe, nimen qidao tamen ba! Tamen buneng ti nimen xiao zai, ye buneng ti nimen jia huo.

17|57|Tamen suo cheng wei shenming zhe, ziji qiu jin zhu zhi jie. Bi tamen geng jin yu zhu zhe ye qiu jin zhu zhi jie, tamen xiwang zhu de enhui, weiju zhu de xingfa. Ni de zhu de xingfa shi yinggai fangbei de.
17|58|Yiqie shi zhen, zai fuhuo ri zhiqian, wo du yao jiayi huimie, huo jiayi yanli de chengfa, zhe shi jilu zai tian jing li de.”
17|59|Wo bu jiang shi jixiang, na shi yinwei qian ren dou bu chengren ta, wo ceng yi mu tuo gei sai mo de ren zuo mingzheng, dan tamen pohaile ta. Wo jiang jixiang zhishi weile donghe.

17|60|Dangshi, wo ceng dui ni shuo:“Ni de zhu shi zhouzhi zhongren de. Wo suo zhaoshi ni de meng zhao he zai “gulanjing” li suo zuzhou di na ke shu, wo zhi yi zhe liang jian shiwu kaoyan zhongren, bing jiayi donghe, dan wo de donghe zhi neng shi tamen gengjia manheng.”

17|61|Dangshi wo ceng dui zhong tianshi shuo:“Nimen yingdang xiang a dan koutou.” Tamen jiu xiang ta koutou. Dan yi bo lie si chuwai. Ta shuo:“Ni yong nitu zaocheng de, wo zen neng xiang ta koutou ne!”
17|62|Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, zhe jiushi ni shi ta chaoyue wo de ren ma? Ruguo ni kuanxian wo dao fuhuo ri, wo shi bi genjue ta de houyi, dan shaoshu ren chuwai.”
17|63|An la shuo:“Ni qu ba! Tamen zhong fan shuncong ni de, huo yu biding shi tamen he ni de chongfen de baochou.

17|64|Ni keyi yong ni de shengyin qu donghe tamen zhong ni suo neng donghe de ren; ni keyi tongshuai ni de qibing he bubing, qu fandui tamen; ni keyi he tamen tong xiang tamen de caichan he ernu; ni keyi xu gei tamen renhe dongxi——emo zhi xu gei tamen wangxiang——
17|65|wo de pu ren, ni dui tamen meiyou renhe quanbing, ni de zhu zu wei jianhu zhe.”
17|66|Nimen de zhu wei nimen er shi chuanzhi zai haishang hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui. Ta dui nimen que shi zhi ci de.

17|67|Dang nimen zai haishang zaoshou zaihai de shihou, nimen xianglai suo qidao de yi huibi nimenle, er nimen zhiyou qidao zhule. Dangzhu shi nimen ping'an denglu de shihou, nimen beipanle zhu. Ren yuan shi gu en de.
17|68|Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen lunxian dixia, huo shi feishazoushi de kuangfeng saodang nimen, er nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao jianhu zhe ma?
17|69|Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen zai qu hanghai, er shi kuangfeng xiji nimen, shi nimen yin gu en er chenni, ranhou, nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe dui zhu baochou zhe ma?
17|70|Wo que yi youdai a dan de houyi, er shi tamen zai lu shang he haishang du you suo qi cheng, wo yi jiamei de shiwu gongji tamen, wo shi tamen dada di chaoguo wo suo chuangzao de xuduo ren.
17|71|(Ni ji zhu), zai na ri, wo jiang zhaohuan mei ge minzu ji qi biaoshuai. Yi youshou jieshou qi gongguo bao zhe, jiang yuedu ziji de benzi; tamen bu shou yi sihao kui she.
17|72|Zai jinshi shi mangren zhe, zai houshi reng shi mangren, erqie gengjia mi wu.
17|73|Tamen que yi shi ni jihu weibei wo suo qishi de jiaoxun, yibian ni jiajie wo de mingyi, er niezao qita de jiaoxun. Name, tamen jiu hui ba ni dang pengyoule.
17|74|Yao bushi wo shi ni jianding, ni jihu yi qingxiang yu tamenle.
17|75|Ruguo nayang, wo bi shi ni zai shengqian changshi jiabei de xingfa, zai si hou changshi jiabei de xingfa, shi ni buneng zhaodao renhe ren bangzhu ni lai duikang wo.
17|76|Tamen que yi shi ni jihu buneng anju guxiang, yibian ba ni zhu chu jingwai. Ruguo nayang, tamen zai ni bei zhu chu zhihou, zhide douliu yihui'er.
17|77|Zhe shi zai ni zhiqian wo suo paiqian de zhong shizhe de changdao, ni duiyu wo de changdao buneng faxian renhe de biangeng.
17|78|Ni yingdang jin shou cong chen shi dao heiye de bai gong; bing yingdang jin shou zaochen bai de songdu, zaochen bai de songdu que shi bei (tianshi) canjia de
17|79|zai yeli de yiduan shijian, ni yingdang jin shou ni suo dang shou de fujia de bai gong, ni de zhu huoxu ba ni tisheng dao yige zhide chengsong di diwei.
17|80|Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo shunli er ru, qiu ni shi wo shunli er chu, qiu ni shangci wo cong ni nali fachu de quanbing, yi zuo wo de fubi.”
17|81|Ni shuo:“Zhenli yijing laile, xuwang yi xiaomiele; xuwang que shi yi mie de”
17|82|wo jiang shi keyi wei xinshimen zhiliao he gei tamen yi enhui de “gulanjing”, ta zhi hui shi bu xindao zhe gengjia kui she.
17|83|Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta diaotou bugu; dang zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta bian cheng juewang de.
17|84|Ni shuo:“Ge ren yi ziji de fangfa er gongzuo, nimen de zhu zui zhidao shei shi geng jin yu zhengdao de.”
17|85|Tamen wen ni jingshen shi shenme? Ni shuo:“Jingshen shi wo de zhu de jimi.” Nimen zhi huode hen shao de zhishi.
17|86|Ruguo wo yiyu, wo shi bi ba wo qishi ni de “gulanjing” xiaomie jingjin, ranhou, ni dui wo buneng faxian renhe jianhu zhe.
17|87|Dan wo wei cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui (cai baocun ta), ni de zhu suo shi yu ni de enhui shi zhongda de.
17|88|Ni shuo:“Ruguo renlei he jingling lianhe qilai chuangzao yi bu xiang zheyang de “gulanjing”, name, tamen jishi huxiang bangzhu, ye bi buneng chuangzao xiang zheyang de miao wen.”
17|89|Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo wei zhongren que yi shenshu ge zhong biyu, dan zhongren daban buxin.
17|90|Tamen shuo:“Women jue buxin ni, zhidao ni wei women er shi yidao yuanquan cong dixia yong chu,
17|91|huozhe ni youyizuo yuanpu, zhongzhizhe ye zao he putao, ni shi heliu guanchuan qijian;
17|92|huozhe ni shi tian ru ni suo shuo di nayang, yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang; huozhe ni qing'an la he zhong tianshi lai zuo baozheng;

17|93|huozhe ni you yi suo huangjin wu; huozhe ni sheng shangtian qu, women jue buxin ni que yi shengtian, zhidao ni jiang shi women suo neng yuedu de jingdian.” Ni shuo:“Zansong wo de zhu chaojue wanwu! Wo zhishi yige ceng feng shiming de fanren.”
17|94|Dang zhengdao jianglin zhongren de shihou, fang'ai tamen xindao de zhishi tamen de zhe ju hua:“Nandao an la paiqian yige fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?”
17|95|Ni shuo:“Jiaruo da dishang you xuduo tianshi anran buxing, name, wo bi cong tianshang jiangxia yige tianshi qu tamen nali zuo shizhe.”
17|96|Ni shuo:“An la zu wei wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, ta duiyu ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.”

17|97|An la yindao shei, shei jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; an la shi shei mi wu, ni buneng wei shei faxian an la yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan.
17|98|Zhe shi tamen de baochou, yinwei tamen buxin wo de jixiang, bingqie shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women yiding hui bei fuhuo cheng xinren ma?”
17|99|Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Chuangzaole tiandi wanwu de an la neng chuangzao xiang tamen nayang de ren, bing neng wei tamen queding yige hao wu keyi de qixian, bu yi de renmen zhi yuan buxin.
17|100|Ni shuo:“Jiaruo wo de zhu de enhui de kucang gui nimen guanli, name, nimen biding yinwei pa kaizhi er kouliu ta de enhui. Ren shi linse de.”

17|101|Dang mu sa lailin yiselie ren de shihou, wo que yi shangci mu sa jiu zhong mingxian de jixiang. Ni wen yi wen yiselie ren ba, falao dui ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi zhongle moshu de ren.”
17|102|Ta shuo:“Ni queshi zhidao, zhiyou tiandi de zhu neng jiang shi zhexie zuowei mingzheng. Falao a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi yao huimie de.”
17|103|Ta yao ba tamen zhu chu jingwai, dan wo shi ta he ta de jundui tongtong yan si.
17|104|Zai ta miewang zhihou, wo dui yiselie ren shuo:“Nimen juzhu zhege difang ba! Dang houshi de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo yao ba nimen zada de zhaoji lai.”
17|105|Wo zhi ben zhenli er jiang shi “gulanjing”, er “gulanjing” ye zhi han zhenli er jiangxia. Wo zhi paiqian ni zuo baoxi xinzhe he jinggao zhe.
17|106|Zhe shi yi bu “gulanjing”, wo shi ta yiyi mingbai, yibian ni congrongbupo di dui zhongren xuandu ta; wo zhujian de jiang shi ta.
17|107|Ni shuo:“Nimen keyi xinyang ta, ye keyi bu xinyang ta.” Zai jiang shi ta zhiqian huode zhishi de renmen, dang ting dao renmen songdu ta de shihou, tamen fufu koutou.
17|108|Tamen shuo:“Zansong women de zhu chaojue wanwu! Women de zhu de nuoyan biding yao bei luxing.”
17|109|Tamen tongkuzhe fufu xiaqu,“gulanjing” shi tamen geng gongjing.

17|110|(Ni shuo):“Nimen keyi cheng ta wei an la, ye ke cheng ta wei zhiren zhu. Yinwei ta you xuduo ji youmei de ming hao, nimen wulun yong shenme ming hao chenghu ta,(dou shi hen hao de).” Ni zai bai zhong buyao gao sheng langdu, ye buyao di sheng modu, ni yingdang xunqiu yitiao shizhong de daolu.
17|111|Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, ta meiyou shouyang ernu, meiyou tong ta gongxiang zhuquan de, meiyou wei mian beijian er she de fuzhu zhe. Ni yingdang zansong ta de zunda.”
